attributes.action: Give UK People a vote to leave the European Union
attributes.additional_details:
We've put up with the EU for too long now. And we're heading down a one way system into disaster! we don't even use the Euro as our national currency!

We should distance ourselves and set up trade agreements again to its a better and fairer deal for the people of the united kingdom!

We no longer have a voice in Europe so its time we stand back and do our own thing!
